scripts.deploy.bootstrap: cd deploy && npm install && npm run bootstrap
scripts.deploy.cicd: cd cicd && npm install && npm run cdk deploy -- --require-approval never
scripts.destroy.cicd: cd cicd && npm install && npm run cdk destroy
scripts.deploy: cd deploy && npm run cdk deploy -- -c stack_name="${STACK_NAME:-}" --all --require-approval never
scripts.destroy: cd deploy && npm run cdk destroy -- -c stack_name="${STACK_NAME:-}" --all
